item.title: Logo Typeface
item.description: Logo Typeface:Klavika Italic Usage Rules Only used in the Logo and its variations in the logo, two weights are used: Bold & Light Glyph Rr Styles Klavika Italic 200 Light Klavika Italic 400 Regular Klavika Italic 600 Medium Klavika Italic 800 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?​‌’​‌“​‌!​‌”​‌(​‌%​‌)​‌[​‌#​‌]​‌{​‌@​‌}​‌/​‌&​‌​‌®​‌©​‌$​‌€​‌£​‌¥​‌¢​‌:​‌;​‌,​‌.​‌* Example Paragraph VHS messenger bag craft beer food truck. Blog tofu williamsburg echo park, viral single-origin coffee umami before they sold out crucifix portland pop-up yuccie dreamcatcher air plant.

item.title: Variations
item.description: Variations On The Logo Usage Rules Variations are designed for products and services to fit within the InfluxData brand All variations follow the same format: Symbol + Bold + Light If your desired variation is not found here, contact Alex and request it Logo Variations follow the same rules specified for the main logo Most variations are prefixed with "Influx" but this is not required Products Services

item.title: Logo DOs & DONT's
item.description: Logo DOs & DON'Ts Usage Rules Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.) Never reveal the bounding box around the logo or symbol If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is simple Example 1 Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background.

item.title: Secondary Typeface
item.description: Secondary Typeface:Roboto Mono Usage Rules The Secondary Typeface is only for use in code samples Use Regular weight for light backgrounds Use Bold weight for dark backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 700 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?​‌’​‌“​‌!​‌”​‌(​‌%​‌)​‌[​‌#​‌]​‌{​‌@​‌}​‌/​‌&​‌​‌®​‌©​‌$​‌€​‌£​‌¥​‌¢​‌:​‌;​‌,​‌.​‌* Example Paragraph VHS messenger bag craft beer food truck. Blog tofu williamsburg echo park, viral single-origin coffee umami before they sold out crucifix portland pop-up yuccie dreamcatcher air plant.

item.title: Anatomy
item.description: Anatomy of The Logo Usage Rules Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol The Symbol: Cuboctahedron Symbol + Logotype

item.title: Gradients & How To Use Them
item.description: Gradients & How To Use Them Usage Rules Gradients are always horizontal, sometimes diagonal but never vertical(This is a defining part of our style) Do not create new gradients Do not modify gradients High saturation gradients are preferred (Pastel Gothic, Low Difficulty, etc.) Influx Color Wheel This wheel represents the acceptable relationships between colors. For example, I can blend into both C and K, but blending into T would be illegal as it skips a step.

item.title: InfluxData Palette
item.description: InfluxData Palette The InfluxData Offical Palette is divided into 5 parts: Nuetrals, and one palette for each component of the TICK stack. The palette is broad because it is intended for all use cases. It is effective for UI, marketing graphics, and everything in between. Usage Rules Do not use colors outside of these palettes Never use true black #000000 Avoid using colored type on a light background Do not use product colors interchangeably Gradients are always horizontal, sometimes diagonal but never vertical Only use gradients specified in the Gradients List If you are using brand colors for print or other non-screen applications, refer to safe alternatives Nuetrals There are many nuetrals because they are the most used.

item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Primary Typeface:Roboto Sans Usage Rules The Primary Typeface is for use in all contexts outside of the logo and its variations, including web, social media, and print graphics "Thin" weight should only be used at large sizes Occasional use of all caps to delineate titling is ideal If background is not white, use white type as much as possible Avoid using colored type on colored backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 100 Thin Roboto 300 Light Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 500 Medium Roboto 700 Bold Roboto 900 Black Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?

item.title: Story
item.description: How The Cuboctahedron Came To Be: The Story Of Our Visual Journey From InfluxDB to InfluxData What began as InfluxDB will become InfluxData; going from product to platform. InfluxDB will become one of four products known collectively as the "TICK Stack". This transition of the company is the inception our efforts. Our goals:We want the logo to feel like a platform while maintaining its own unique identity.

item.title: Artwork
item.description: Widescreen Artwork For Web & Print Usage Rules Best used as backgrounds beneath text or other graphics Works well in Hero images on the website Ready to Use Images

item.title: Mascots
item.description: InfluxData Mascots We make use of animal mascots to add more personality to the brand. They are not the official representations of our products or The TICK Stack as a whole. The mascots are primarily used in promotional material such as stickers and merchandise. Each product has an associated animal that uses the same starting character (Except Chronograf). Telegraf Tiger InfluxDB I'iwi Chronograf Giraffe Kapacitor Koala Outreach Club Octopus Downloads Color + Transparent Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-24 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-24 400x295 Chronograf PNG-24 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-24 280x380 Outreach PNG-24 249x400 Color + White Background Mascot Format Dimensions Telegraf PNG-8 / JPG 400x268 InfluxDB PNG-8 / JPG 400x295 Chronograf PNG-8 / JPG 339x400 Kapacitor PNG-8 / JPG 280x380 Outreach PNG-8 / JPG 249x400

item.title: Photography
item.description: Gradient Mapped Photography Usage Rules Best used as backgrounds beneath text or other graphics Works well in Hero images on the website Ready to Use Images

item.title: Themes
item.description: Themes in Brand Imagery Photography Guidelines: Photography must always be gradient mapped using the Brand Neutrals Gradient map effect makes the photography easy to place type or graphics over Themes: Architecture - Minimalistic, organic forms are ideal. Focus on lines that extend beyond the frame as well as repeating patterns Water - Avoid high noise imagery (such as splashes). Best to use images that capture the fluidity of water San Francisco - Images of our HQ city's landmarks are acceptable Graphics + Photography Guidelines:
